resources.string:
In the world of technology, innovations have always fascinated me.

		Every year, technology surprises me and keeps me wondering how they make these things. Would I be part of that universe?

		And here I am now, a software developer who makes mobile applications and embraces the world of web development.

		Technology will constantly evolve, and people need to adapt these things to help them, while developers need to innovate more technology.

		As a developer, itâ€™s a great experience to be part of it with other people who have the same goals but want to solve problems differently.
